description: Free-ranging and ass-fed. That sums up the salami of Boomer Banks. He grabs onto an overhead meat hook to stabilize himself as Boomer slams into him, tenderizing his hole. Thick streams of cum cement their spent bodies in a seal of approval.
title: San Francisco Meat Packers - Part 1, Scene #01
